thread.section_title: MicksGarage.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MicksGarage.com | www.micksgarage.com
thread.title: Carmelo Mercieca

author: Carmelo Mercieca
title: Carmelo Mercieca
text:
Hi to All,
I recommend Micks Garage and all of his stuff especially Ms Laura .W. because they're great . I bought two sets of wind deflectors and sadly one of them arrived broken . I contacted the stuff of Micks Garage and they accepted to resend another set. An other thing is that when I bought them they arrived after only 3 days including the weekend ,so I think it's fast .
Thanks Micks Garage looking forward to make more business with you .
Keep it up
Regards
Carmelo
